VitalServer is now offering a new service "Virtual Private Server Lite" for $50/month. Includes 1GB disk space and 25+GB/month of average bandwidth capability.

VitalServer Virtual Private/Dedicated Servers offer you full root (Administrator) access, unlimited domains/users/bandwidth transfer, primary DNS, Webmin control panel, and more! The possibilities are almost limitless.

Visit: http://www.vitalserver.com
Email: sales@vitalserver.com
